Package ooga.view

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    Display  
    FrontEndInternalAPI
    This interface is not meant to be implemented by any specific class.
    GameWindow
    The top level UI element of a view.
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    Board  
    BoardScene
    This scene holds the view representation of the main game board.
    FloatingWindow  
    GameBoardViewController
    The controller class for any BoardScene.
    GameDisplay  
    GameScene
    A GameScene object extends Scene and is given to a GameWindow to show.
    GameSceneFactory
    Creates GameScene subclasses, however returns the general GameScene object rather than the concrete subclass.
    GameWindowFactory
    This class creates objects that extend GameWindow.
    GameWindowFactoryTest  
    StageWindow
    A subclass of GameWindow that extends Stage.
    Tile  
    ViewManager
    Instantiates and manages all views for a single game instance.
    WelcomeScene
    A subclass of GameScene, this scene is the first one viewers see when starting the game.
